name: Rafhead
description:
Rafhead is a game I made because Cuphead is very popular and I was bored.

--How to play--

A & D to move

W to jump

F to fire

1 to dash

--Objective--

Beat me as a Cuphead Boss..

--Credits--

3D models by Me and Studio MDHR

Original Cuphead Game by Studio MDHR

Art by Me and juanito1509 (Scratch)

Coding by Me and juanito1509 (Scratch)

Inspiration by Studio MDHR and juanito1509 (Scratch)

Created by Me
